= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *PCA.FT.SPL.SA* || Somatosensory Association Cortex || Neocortex BA-5 || Locating objects in space || Superior parietal lobule ||
|| *PCA.FT.SPL.PR* || Precuneus || Neocortex BA-7 || Spatial orientation, Representation of the self || Superior parietal lobule ||
|| *PCA.FT.IPL* || Inferior Parietal Lobule || Neocortex BA-40 || Perception of emotions in facial stimuli and interpretation of sensory information || SMG, Represent spoken words, tool use ||
|| *PCA.FT.IPS* || Intraparietal Sulcus || Neocortex BA-39 || Perceptual-motor coordination and visual attention, eye movements and reaching || AG, Represent written words ||
|| *PCA.FT.RSC* || Retrosplenial Cortex || Neocortex BA-26,29,30 || Processing of emotionally salient stimuli || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.FT.PCG* || Posterior Cingulate Cortex || Neocortex BA-23,31 || Self-awareness, pain and episodic memory retrieval || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.FD.TH.RIL* || Rostral Intralaminar Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Stimulate memory-guided response || from brainstem to SPL.SA ||
|| *PCA.FD.TH.LP* || Lateral Posterior Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Visual association cortex || from superior colliculus, pretectum ||
|| *PCA.FD.TH.SG* || Suprageniculate Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Spatial coding of auditory information || From tectum, somatic sensations ||
|| *PCA.FD.TH.PO* || Posterior Nucleus of Thalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Somatic markers for spatial coding || To parietal association cortices ||

= Groupings and Subdivisions  =
